Name: [Servitor Command Node]
Description: A vast operations chamber dominated by a towering control nexus - a spire of corroded metal and pulsing Runic conduits. This was once the coordination hub for Aethelgard's automated security forces. Now it serves as the lair of a Servitor Overseer, a Draugr-Pattern unit whose patrol-loop has degraded into territorial aggression. The walls are scarred by centuries of automated defense protocols gone haywire.
NarrativeText: The Servitor Overseer has been broadcasting corrupted directives for 800 years, commanding lesser automata to 'defend' the abandoned facility from non-existent intruders. Destroying it will cripple the hostile servitor network throughout [The Roots], making deeper exploration feasible. The Overseer is heavily armored and capable of summoning reinforcements from nearby patrol routes.
FlavorText: The control nexus flickers with erratic status displays - diagnostics for systems that failed centuries ago. Servitor corpses litter the floor, cannibalized for parts by the Overseer to maintain its operational state.
